name: Friday Night Funkin' Burning in hell
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' Burning in hell
description:
i think you should translate this. type "ik zie het water in de lucht". (op) (lucht means air)

this is not even emotional :/

Controls:

Arrow keys and WASD - Navigate menu

WASD (Can be changed in settings) - Arrow inputs

Z - Exit menu

M - Mute/unmute debug menu music

Credits:
